entry.title: Add a User to the Wheel Group in OSX
entry.content:
Why are these things always so weird? Someday I’ll understand why OSX is set up that way. And on that day, I’ll probably weep.

$ sudo /usr/bin/dscl . -append /groups/wheel GroupMembership username

This was found here : https://discussions.apple.com/thread/1230828?start=0&tstart=0

entry.title: Ruby: Gem Ffi on OSX Mountain Lion 10.8
entry.content:
EASY!

sudo ln -s /usr/bin/gcc /usr/bin/gcc-4.2

 

That’s it. You can now install ffi 1.5.

entry.title: Lisp on OSX
entry.content:
Just a link to a page.. Got me started with barely any trouble (just make sure you know how to read a .emacs file – I learned on the fly on his page, it wasn’t too tricky).

http://www.david-steuber.com/Lisp/OSX/
